articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Joe Biden on Trump's decision to target Soleimani in airstrike
articles.description: In an exclusive interview with NBC Nightly News, presidential candidate Joe Biden talks to Lester Holt about the escalating tensions with Iran.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Sen. Angus King: Soleimani strike 'not worth the risk'
articles.description: Senator Angus King (I-ME) joins MTP Daily to discuss the Soleimani strike and what to expect next.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: The new normal in presidential politics: Trolling through Super Bowl ads
articles.description: Mike Bloomberg’s campaign spends $10 million on 60 seconds of airtime during the Super Bowl to aggravate the president

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: US prepares for potential Iran retaliation
articles.description: MSNBC National Security Analyst Juan Zarate joins MTP Daily to discuss what to expect from a potential Iran retaliation.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Tuesday's Mini-Report, 1.7.20
articles.content:
Today’s edition of quick hits:
* Impeachment politics: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., said Tuesday he has enough Republican votes to start the impeachment trial of President Donald Trump without the support of Democrats, who have been demandi… [+2217 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Blumenthal: 'The House or the Senate should compel' Bolton's testimony
articles.description: Senator Richard Blumenthal joins MSNB's Chris Jansing to discuss the latest in the impeachment of President Trump.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Speier talks Esper's update on Iran
articles.description: Defense Secretary Mark Esper said that the United States is seeking a diplomatic solution with Iran. Democratic Representative Jackie Speier joins MSNBC's Chris Jansing to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Met Museum President on Why Cultural Sites Need Protection
articles.description: President & CEO of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Daniel Weiss, joins Ali Velshi to discuss the significance of cultural sites and symbols, after President Trump threatened to target Iranian cultural sites.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Clinton Impeachment Manager: Both sides need witnesses
articles.description: Senate Republican leaders have the votes to move forward with President Trump's impeachment trial, without Democratic support, in a format that echoes President Clinton’s impeachment trial. Former Republican Congressman and impeachment manager Bill McCollum t…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: President Trump backs down on a threat after being contradicted by members of his cabinet
articles.description: President Trump takes back his threat to target Iranian cultural sites after his Secretary of Defense and Secretary of State contradict him

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How Iran could respond to Soleimani’s death
articles.description: Council on Foreign Relations Senior Fellow for Middle East Studies Steven Cook talks with Ali Velshi about how Iran will likely retaliate for the drone strike that killed its top general, Qassem Soleimani.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Was the strike on Qassem Soleimani legal?
articles.description: Ali Velshi talks with Karen Greenberg, director of the Center on National Security at the Fordham University Law School, about whether the Trump administration followed the law when the president ordered the drone strike that killed Iran’s top general.
